scripts.start:railway:debug: echo 'Starting Railway deployment...' && npx prisma generate && echo 'Prisma client generated, starting server...' && node dist/app.js
scripts.start:railway:simple: echo 'Simple Railway start - skipping build' && npx prisma generate && echo 'Prisma generated, now starting app...' && node dist/app.js
scripts.build:railway: tsc --skipLibCheck --noEmitOnError && echo 'TypeScript compilation successful' && cp src/config/*.js dist/config/ && echo 'Config files copied'
scripts.build: tsc && cp src/config/recoveryPointsConfig.js dist/config/ && cp src/config/tdiQuestions.js dist/config/ && cp src/config/regionConfig.js dist/config/ && cp src/config/envValidation.js dist/config/ && cp -r src/routes/*.js dist/routes/ && cp -r src/services/*.js dist/services/ && cp -r node_modules/@prisma dist/ && echo 'Build completed successfully with envValidation.js'
